entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DisableTransitiveProjectReferences does not appear to work #42947
  • Workload installation failed: Workload ID android isn't supported on this platform. #42946
  • BinaryToolKit fails during ./prep-source-build.sh on arm64 #42944

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update the .NET 9 build table #42883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update VMR README.md timeframe around two-way code flow #42955
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update VMR README.md timeframe around two-way code flow #42954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move WindowsProxy.winmd from allowed-sb-binaries.txt to allowed-vmr-binaries.txt #42949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude Directory.Build.rsp from .gitignore template #42401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs team triage, 10.0.1xx

Updated

  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RemoveJsonPropertyPostAction for symmetry with AddJsonPropertyPos… #42836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop using IReadOnlyList when it's always single #42866
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
